message.body: I don't want to be gross. But that is the camelbak after 50 miles, in today's heat, and hills. I guess it's mostly salt, but it is scenes like this that make me
wonder if I should be eating various vitamins, or if just some dinner and a banana actually replenishes this much....stuff.
The salt is really the only thing you need to worry about. Not that it's there, but replacing it, I mean :-) But the typical American diet does that pretty well
Yeah. I still have a slight headache. I don't know though if I have one because I drank too much, or too little. I had 90 oz. 30 of those were gatoraid. Apples
